info.title: Pet Shop API - Swagger Documentation
info.description:
This API has been created with the goal to test the coding skills of the candidates who are applying for a job position at Buckhill

- Wireframe: link

get.summary: List all orders to populate the dashboard

products.description: Array of objects with product uuid and quantity
Array of objects with product uuid and quantity

details.description: Review documentation for the payment type JSON format
Review documentation for the payment type JSON format

get.summary: List all orders for the user

post.summary: Creates a token to reset a user password
Reset a user password with the a token
